frontmatter.title: Event Head - Compusys, CSE Student Society
frontmatter.company: Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering & Management

node.html: Led planning and execution of a week-long academic event, coordinating space setup, guest registration, volunteer shifts, and real-time logistics for 200+ attendees across multiple venues.

frontmatter.title: Class Representative
frontmatter.company: Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering & Management

node.html: Served as the elected point of contact for a cohort of 60+ students for four consecutive years, responsible for communicating academic updates from faculty and presenting consolidated student feedback to resolve issues.

frontmatter.title: Vice President - Robotics Club
frontmatter.company: Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering & Management

node.html: Led a team of 6 to prepare and coordinate for an international robotics competition, managing technical setup, team scheduling, and equipment logistics.

frontmatter.title: Team Lead - Smart India Hackathon
frontmatter.company: Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering & Management

node.html: Led a team to develop a deep-learning-powered software solution using YOLOv5 to detect and identify aquatic animal species in deep-water environments, increasing throughput by 50%.
